Header: Mother of two hacked to death
Content: A mother of two has died after she was attacked with a sharp object in Meegoda. The victim, aged 45 was a resident of Vihara Mawatha at Henawatte in Dickhathakma in Meegoda. The victim's husband was a retired army officer. Her mother had told police that she came out of the house early morning and little later she heard her daughter was screaming. She added when she came out of the house and found her daughter lying in the garden unresponsive. However, police are yet to identify the suspect.
